verbs.description: [ARG0: Golden State Warriors] [V: head] [ARG1: coach Steve Kerr] on Wednesday blasted President Donald Trump for canceling the Philadelphia Eagles Super Bowl celebration at the White House and instead hosting " military sing - alongs " in its place .
